trans-unit.source: Hybrid cloud test environments in Azure | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Hybrid cloud test environments in Azure | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Find the articles that describe how to build dev/test or proof-of-concept IT pro environments for your Azure-based hybrid cloud.
trans-unit.target: Find the articles that describe how to build dev/test or proof-of-concept IT pro environments for your Azure-based hybrid cloud.

trans-unit.source: Azure hybrid cloud test environments
trans-unit.target: Azure hybrid cloud test environments

trans-unit.source: For dev/test or a proof-of-concept, hybrid cloud test environments use your local Internet connection and one of your public IP addresses and step you through setting up a functioning, cross-premises Azure Virtual Network (VNet).
trans-unit.target: For dev/test or a proof-of-concept, hybrid cloud test environments use your local Internet connection and one of your public IP addresses and step you through setting up a functioning, cross-premises Azure Virtual Network (VNet).

trans-unit.source: When you are finished, you can develop and test applications, experiment with simplified IT workloads, and gauge the performance of a site-to-site virtual private network (VPN) connection relative to your location on the Internet.
trans-unit.target: When you are finished, you can develop and test applications, experiment with simplified IT workloads, and gauge the performance of a site-to-site virtual private network (VPN) connection relative to your location on the Internet.

trans-unit.source: These articles currently create virtual machines, virtual networks, and other resources in Service Management.
trans-unit.target: These articles currently create virtual machines, virtual networks, and other resources in Service Management.

trans-unit.source: Hybrid cloud base configuration
trans-unit.target: Hybrid cloud base configuration

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>hybrid cloud base configuration</linkText><title></title></link> consists of:
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>hybrid cloud base configuration</linkText><title></title></link> consists of:

trans-unit.source: A simplified on-premises network with four virtual machines (a domain controller, an application server, a client computer, and a VPN device running Windows Server and Routing and Remote Access)
trans-unit.target: A simplified on-premises network with four virtual machines (a domain controller, an application server, a client computer, and a VPN device running Windows Server and Routing and Remote Access)

trans-unit.source: An Azure virtual network with a replica domain controller
trans-unit.target: An Azure virtual network with a replica domain controller

trans-unit.source: A site-to-site VPN connection
trans-unit.target: A site-to-site VPN connection

trans-unit.source: SharePoint intranet farm in a hybrid cloud
trans-unit.target: SharePoint intranet farm in a hybrid cloud

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>SharePoint intranet farm in a hybrid cloud test environment</linkText><title></title></link> adds a SQL Server 2014 server and a SharePoint Server 2013 server to the hybrid cloud base configuration.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>SharePoint intranet farm in a hybrid cloud test environment</linkText><title></title></link> adds a SQL Server 2014 server and a SharePoint Server 2013 server to the hybrid cloud base configuration.

trans-unit.source: This creates a two-tier SharePoint farm that you can access from the client computer on the simplified on-premises network.
trans-unit.target: This creates a two-tier SharePoint farm that you can access from the client computer on the simplified on-premises network.

trans-unit.source: Web-based line-of-business (LOB) application in a hybrid cloud
trans-unit.target: Web-based line-of-business (LOB) application in a hybrid cloud

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>web-based LOB application in a hybrid cloud test environment</linkText><title></title></link> adds a SQL Server 2014 server and an Internet Information Services (IIS) server to the hybrid cloud base configuration.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>web-based LOB application in a hybrid cloud test environment</linkText><title></title></link> adds a SQL Server 2014 server and an Internet Information Services (IIS) server to the hybrid cloud base configuration.

trans-unit.source: This creates the infrastructure in which you can deploy and test a tiered, web-based LOB application.
trans-unit.target: This creates the infrastructure in which you can deploy and test a tiered, web-based LOB application.

trans-unit.source: Office 365 Directory Synchronization (DirSync) server in a hybrid cloud
trans-unit.target: Office 365 Directory Synchronization (DirSync) server in a hybrid cloud

trans-unit.source: The <link><linkText>Office 365 DirSync server in a hybrid cloud test environment</linkText><title></title></link> adds a DirSync server to the hybrid cloud base configuration and demonstrates Office 365 DirSync with password synchronization to a trial Office 365 subscription.
trans-unit.target: The <link><linkText>Office 365 DirSync server in a hybrid cloud test environment</linkText><title></title></link> adds a DirSync server to the hybrid cloud base configuration and demonstrates Office 365 DirSync with password synchronization to a trial Office 365 subscription.

trans-unit.source: Simulated hybrid cloud test environment
trans-unit.target: Simulated hybrid cloud test environment

trans-unit.source: For organizations and individuals for which a direct Internet connection and public IP address are not readily available, the <link><linkText>simulated hybrid cloud test environment</linkText><title></title></link> builds out the simplified on-premises network in a separate Azure Virtual Network and then connects the two virtual networks with a VNet-to-VNet VPN connection.
trans-unit.target: For organizations and individuals for which a direct Internet connection and public IP address are not readily available, the <link><linkText>simulated hybrid cloud test environment</linkText><title></title></link> builds out the simplified on-premises network in a separate Azure Virtual Network and then connects the two virtual networks with a VNet-to-VNet VPN connection.
